channel.title: CVE Feed for Synology -- Camera Firmware
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Synology -- Camera Firmware

item.title: CVE-2024-5463|2024-06-04T09:34:06.934Z -- Synology -- Camera Firmware
item.description: A vulnerability regarding buffer copy without checking the size of input ('Classic Buffer Overflow') has been found in the login component. This allows remote attackers to conduct denial-of-service attacks via unspecified vectors. This attack only affects the login service which will automatically restart. The following models with Synology Camera Firmware versions before 1.1.1-0383 may be affected: BC500 and TC500.
